languages.text: {n}Капитан нервно дергает уголком рта.{/n} "Проклятье... и когда они успели?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Капитан нервно дергает уголком рта.{/n} "Проклятье... и когда они успели?"

languages.text: {n}The corner of the captain's mouth twitches nervously as he mutters,{/n} "Damn those... How did they even..."

languages.text: {n}Les commissures des lèvres du capitaine frémissent nerveusement alors qu'il bredouille :{/n} « Maudits soient ces... Comment ont-ils pu... »
languages.original_text: {n}The corner of the captain's mouth twitches nervously as he mutters,{/n} "Damn those... How did they even..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les commissures des lèvres du capitaine frémissent nerveusement alors qu'il bredouille :{/n} « Maudits soient ces... Comment ont-ils pu... »

languages.text: {n}La comisura de la boca del capitán se crispa nerviosamente antes de murmurar entre dientes:{/n} «Esos condenados... Cómo se las han arreglado para...».
languages.original_text: {n}The corner of the captain's mouth twitches nervously as he mutters,{/n} "Damn those... How did they even..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La comisura de la boca del capitán se crispa nerviosamente antes de murmurar entre dientes:{/n} «Esos condenados... Cómo se las han arreglado para...».

languages.text: {n}ぼそぼそと呟く中隊長の口の端が、不安げに歪む。{/n}「なんでこれが…一体どうして…」
languages.original_text: {n}The corner of the captain's mouth twitches nervously as he mutters,{/n} "Damn those... How did they even..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ぼそぼそと呟く中隊長の口の端が、不安げに歪む。{/n}「なんでこれが…一体どうして…」

languages.text: {n}弗伦索上尉的嘴角紧张地抽搐着，喃喃自语道。{/n}“那些该死的……他们到底是怎么……”
languages.original_text: {n}The corner of the captain's mouth twitches nervously as he mutters,{/n} "Damn those... How did they even..."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗伦索上尉的嘴角紧张地抽搐着，喃喃自语道。{/n}“那些该死的……他们到底是怎么……”

languages.text: {n}Die Mundwinkel des Captains zucken nervös, als er murmelt:{/n} "Verdammt ... Wie haben sie überhaupt ..."

languages.text: {n}Dudağı gergince seğiren Kaptan, sonrasında sözlerine başlıyor.{/n} "Kahrolasıcalar... Nasıl oldu da..."
